_header: Calais men now may ye care
_description: Laurence Minot, The Siege of Calais — twelve 8-line stanzas

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Calays men now mai ȝe careand muring mun ȝe haue to
                    mede…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…all on þis wise was Calais wongod saue þam þat
                    it so gat wan
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
How Edward als þe romance sais / held his sege bifor Calais (rubric by
                    scribe, f. 55va)
